# Test completions for a file that does not yet exist on disk

vim ex 'e main.go'
vim ex 'r main.txt | 0d_'
vim ex 'w main.go'
cmp main.go main.txt

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

go 1.12
-- main.txt --
package main

func main() {
}
